law.catch_line: Information required from applicant -- Driver not permitted to drive, when -- Employer restriction on operation of commercial vehicles.

text.section: Each employer shall require the applicant to provide the information specified in KRS 281A.070. He shall inform the applicant that the information provided may be used or the applicant's previous employers may be contacted for the purpose of investigating the applicant's work history.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 3, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 455, sec. 8, effective July 1, 1991.
